snippet: Visiting Greece on his final international tour as president, Mr. Obama again discussed Donald J. Trump’s election victory....
abstract: Pres Obama, in Greece as part of final international tour during his tenure, emphasizes strength and effectiveness of democracy, pitches for European Union and praises Greek government's effort to shelter Syrian refugees.
lead_paragraph: Visiting Greece on his final international tour as president, Mr. Obama again discussed Donald J. Trump’s election victory.

headline.main: ‘American Democracy Is Bigger Than Any One Person,’ Obama Says
headline.print_headline: Obama, in Greece, Calls U.S. Democracy ‘Bigger’ Than Any One Person
